title: Tran - iam mihi prima dea - Ovid Heroides 4

content.question: How is the sentence translated?

choices.label: Now Diana’s bow is first for me, outstanding with its curve.
Now my outstanding goddess is first with Diana’s curved bow.
Now the goddess Diana first curved her outstanding bow for me.
Now for me, the goddess Diana, outstanding with her curved bow, is first.

content.answer: Now for me, the goddess Diana, outstanding with her curved bow, is first.

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry
